Discover My Work

Explore my portfolio, where I showcase a range of web development projects, including my Movie Recommendation System and other innovative applications. With a focus on both frontend and backend technologies, I build user-centric solutions using Node.js, EJS, SQL, JavaScript, and modern frameworks like Tailwind CSS and Bootstrap. Each project demonstrates my ability to create functional, intuitive, and scalable systems that address real-world challenges.
